top_articles.title: Critical King Addons Vulnerability Exploited to Hack WordPress Sites
top_articles.summary: A critical-severity vulnerability in the King Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress has been exploited to take over websites.

top_articles.title: Ransomware Attack Disrupts Local Emergency Alert System Across US
top_articles.summary: The OnSolve CodeRED platform has been targeted by the Inc Ransom ransomware group, resulting in disruptions and a data breach.

top_articles.title: Years of JSONFormatter and CodeBeautify Leaks Expose Thousands of Passwords and API Keys
